data.description:
Game in early access - new content appearing regulary

Realm Protector is an Action - Tower Defence game with unique approach to the genre.
Build four types of magic towers, each with own element and mechanics.
Fight hordes of enemies by entering towers and operating them manually.
Burn, shock, freeze or curse by using power of magic.
Join the Order of Magicians, and defend other worlds.
Become the true Realm Protector.


Game features:
- Four unique towers - You wanna cast lightnings from your fingers? Snipe enemies with magic crossbow? Bombard them with powerful fireballs from magic cannon? Or freeze them to death with icenovas from frost drums?
- Upgrade your towers - All of them can be upgraded to more powerful versions with game changing powers.
- Take control - Any summoned tower will attack enemies in range, but their true powers will be released when you will take control.
- Fight horde! Even 300 enemies simultaneously before your eyes!
- Defend unique worlds - each realm has own climat and visuals!
- Plan your strategy - each enemy type have his own resistances and weaknesses - adapt to them or lose.
- Challenge yourself - play again previously completed levels on higher difficulties with additional twists.
